jobs.job_statement: When I am looking for events to join, I want to easily find the events and their details, so I can choose which ones to participate in.
jobs.current_solution: Using the website to check the calendar and event details.
pain_points: Difficult navigation requiring multiple backtracking steps.
No search functionality on the website.
Lack of clarity on registration status and event capacity.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A streamlined process for finding and signing up for events with clear status updates.
jobs.success_criteria: Ability to quickly locate events using a search function and easily access event details.

jobs.job_statement: When I need to sign up for events, I want a seamless registration process, so I can participate without hassle.
jobs.current_solution: Using the app for registration.
pain_points: Website registration process is slow and clunky.
Issues with captcha slowing down the process.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A fast and efficient registration process that minimizes unnecessary steps.
jobs.success_criteria: Ability to register for events quickly without technical difficulties.

jobs.job_statement: When I want to see what events I have signed up for, I want to easily find that information, so I can keep track of my commitments.
jobs.current_solution: Checking my emails or using the app.
pain_points: Difficulty in locating signed-up events on the website.
Inconsistent visibility of event registration status.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A straightforward way to view all my signed-up events in one place.
jobs.success_criteria: Ability to see all signed-up events in my profile on the website or app.

jobs.job_statement: When I want to sign up for events, I want to easily access the event registration, so I can participate without confusion.
jobs.current_solution: Using the app for event registration.
jobs.pain_points: On the website, users have to navigate multiple pages and clicks to find event registration.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Streamlined access to event registration from the main calendar view.
jobs.success_criteria: Users can register for events in a few clicks without confusion.

jobs.job_statement: When I need to find information about committees, I want to easily locate committee descriptions, so I can get involved in activities.
jobs.current_solution: Accessing the committee list on the website.
jobs.pain_points: Committee descriptions are not clearly labeled or easily accessible on the website.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Clear and direct access to committee descriptions and contact information.
jobs.success_criteria: Users can find relevant committee information without difficulty.

jobs.job_statement: When I am new to Santa Barbara, I want to connect with other newcomers, so I can build a social network in my new environment.
jobs.current_solution: Joining Santa Barbara newcomers and exploring events through the app.
jobs.pain_points: Overwhelmed by the number of clubs and committees; difficulty finding relevant information on the website.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Easily identify and join groups that match my interests.
jobs.success_criteria: Successfully connect with other newcomers and participate in events that align with my interests.

jobs.job_statement: When I want to register for events, I want a seamless experience, so I can easily join without frustration.
jobs.current_solution: Using the app to register for events.
jobs.pain_points: Website is confusing and not user-friendly; reliance on the app due to dissatisfaction with the website.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A more intuitive registration process that encourages engagement.
jobs.success_criteria: Easily register for events without confusion or technical issues.

jobs.job_statement: When I am managing events through the newcomers website, I want to ensure accurate registration and payment processing, so I can effectively communicate with attendees and avoid confusion.
jobs.current_solution: Using the website and phone app for event registration and management.
jobs.pain_points: Conflicting information between the phone app and the actual registration log, complicated event management processes, and inadequate training for new committee members.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A seamless registration process that provides clear information and reduces user errors.
jobs.success_criteria: Users can register without confusion, and administrators can easily verify registrations.

jobs.job_statement: When I want to find out about upcoming events, I want to easily access and navigate the website, so I can plan my schedule and contact friends.
jobs.current_solution: Logging into the computer-based website.
jobs.pain_points: The event descriptions can be unclear, and the phone app is underpowered.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A clear and intuitive interface on both the website and phone app that provides accurate event information.
jobs.success_criteria: Users can quickly find and understand event details without needing additional help.

jobs.job_statement: When I am involved in event planning, I want to have a reliable way to archive and pass on information, so I can ensure continuity and efficiency with future events.
jobs.current_solution: Current informal methods of communication and memory.
jobs.pain_points: Lack of formalized institutional memory leads to loss of valuable information and processes.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A structured way to document and share event planning processes and outcomes.
jobs.success_criteria: New committee members can access historical data and learn from past events easily.

jobs.job_statement: When I am joining a new community group, I want to easily sign up and navigate the website/app, so I can quickly participate in events and feel a part of the community.
jobs.current_solution: The sign-up process was straightforward and user-friendly.
jobs.pain_points: The app lacks some functionalities, like easily contacting committee chairs if I cannot attend an event.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A seamless registration experience and easy access to committee contact information.
jobs.success_criteria: Users can register, navigate, and communicate regarding events without confusion.

jobs.job_statement: When I want to participate in events, I want to find relevant events quickly, so I can manage my time and commitments effectively.
jobs.current_solution: The website has a list and calendar view for events.
jobs.pain_points: Finding specific events can be overwhelming due to the large number of activities and the lack of filtering options.
jobs.desired_outcomes: An efficient way to filter or search for events based on my interests.
jobs.success_criteria: Users can easily filter events and find those relevant to their interests without excessive scrolling.

jobs.job_statement: When I am planning events for the Newcomers Club, I want to utilize the website and app effectively, so I can ensure smooth event registration and management.
jobs.current_solution: Using the Wild Apricot application for managing events and registrations.
jobs.pain_points: The phone app is underpowered, provides conflicting information, and is not user-friendly for all members.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A more reliable and user-friendly mobile app that provides accurate event registration information.
jobs.success_criteria: Members can easily register for events and access accurate information through their preferred devices without confusion.

jobs.job_statement: When I am involved in committee work, I want to access administrative features on the website, so I can manage events effectively.
jobs.current_solution: Logging in as an administrator to view backend features.
jobs.pain_points: The administrative interface is complex and not well documented for new users.
jobs.desired_outcomes: An intuitive administrative interface with better training resources for new committee members.
jobs.success_criteria: Committee members can navigate the administrative functions efficiently and manage events without frustration.

jobs.job_statement: When I need to update my information, I want to easily access the update feature, so I can keep my profile current.
jobs.current_solution: Users can update their information through the app.
jobs.pain_points: The process is not obvious, and many users are unaware of how to do it.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A straightforward method for users to update their information on their own.
jobs.success_criteria: Users report that they can easily find and use the update feature without external help.

jobs.job_statement: When I want to join events, I want the process to be intuitive and seamless, so I can participate without frustration.
jobs.current_solution: Users can join events through the website or app.
jobs.pain_points: The current process is convoluted, and information about events is not easily accessible.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A simplified and clear event joining process that provides all necessary information upfront.
jobs.success_criteria: Users report a smooth experience when joining events without confusion or excessive navigation.

jobs.job_statement: When I need to keep track of my events, I want a dedicated page that lists all my registered events, so I can manage my schedule easily.
jobs.current_solution: A 'my newcomers' page exists but is not user-friendly.
jobs.pain_points: Users find it challenging to navigate and find their events on the website.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A well-organized and easily accessible list of events that users are registered for.
jobs.success_criteria: Users can quickly find and manage their events in one place without unnecessary clicks.

jobs.job_statement: When I am using the platform, I want to feel confident and informed, so I can engage with my community effectively.
jobs.current_solution: Using the app which is more intuitive than the website.
jobs.pain_points: The website is confusing, leading to feelings of frustration and inadequacy.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A user-friendly experience that empowers me to engage without hesitation.
jobs.success_criteria: Users report feeling confident and satisfied with their ability to navigate and use the platform.

jobs.job_statement: When I explore the newcomers' website, I want to feel excited and welcomed, so I can feel comfortable joining and participating.
jobs.current_solution: The current website and app.
jobs.pain_points: Website feels dated and uninviting; does not evoke excitement.
jobs.desired_outcomes: An engaging and visually appealing website that makes me feel valued.
jobs.success_criteria: Feel motivated to explore and participate in events based on the website’s design and content.

jobs.job_statement: When I am using the newcomers website, I want to feel confident in my ability to navigate it, so I can enjoy my involvement without frustration.
jobs.current_solution: Utilizing the website and phone app.
jobs.pain_points: Frustration with technical issues and lack of clarity in navigation.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A user-friendly experience that instills confidence in using the platform.
jobs.success_criteria: Users express satisfaction with the website's usability and feel empowered to engage with it.

jobs.job_statement: When attending events, I want to feel included and recognized, so I can build connections with other members.
jobs.current_solution: Using printed name tags for events.
jobs.pain_points: Handwritten name tags can indicate registration issues and may exclude some members from feeling welcome.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Printed name tags that visually signify attendance and roles within the organization.
jobs.success_criteria: All attendees have professional name tags, and the atmosphere feels inclusive.

jobs.job_statement: When I join a new group, I want to feel welcomed and engaged, so I can build connections and feel part of the community.
jobs.current_solution: The orientation and meet and greet events were helpful.
jobs.pain_points: The website/app does not feel very inviting or visually appealing.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A welcoming online experience that reflects the community spirit.
jobs.success_criteria: Users report feeling engaged and excited about participating in events.

jobs.job_statement: When I am hosting an event, I want to feel confident in the registration process, so I can ensure that attendees have a positive experience.
jobs.current_solution: Using printed name tags and maintaining accurate registration records.
jobs.pain_points: Worry about unregistered attendees showing up, which can lead to confusion and embarrassment.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A reliable system that prevents registration issues and ensures all attendees are accounted for.
jobs.success_criteria: A seamless registration experience with printed name tags that help identify attendees correctly.

jobs.job_statement: When I use the club's website, I want to feel that it represents a contemporary and vibrant community, so I can feel proud to be a member.
jobs.current_solution: The current website design is outdated.
jobs.pain_points: Members feel that the website does not reflect the club's modern values or attract new members.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A refreshed and contemporary website design that resonates with members and potential newcomers.
jobs.success_criteria: Positive feedback from members regarding the new website design and increased engagement from newcomers.

jobs.job_statement: When I am new to the community, I want to feel welcomed and integrated, so I can build connections and feel at home.
jobs.current_solution: New member orientation and events exist.
jobs.pain_points: Some new members feel lost or unsure about how to get involved.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A welcoming environment that fosters connection among new members.
jobs.success_criteria: New members express feelings of belonging and connection after participating in events.

jobs.job_statement: When I participate in events, I want to be seen as an engaged member of the community, so I can build my reputation and network.
jobs.current_solution: Attending events and using the app to sign up.
jobs.pain_points: Complicated website navigation may limit participation and visibility.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Easier access to participation opportunities to enhance my social presence.
jobs.success_criteria: Increased participation in events and recognition from peers.

jobs.job_statement: When I participate in newcomers' events, I want to be perceived as an engaged and friendly member, so I can build a positive reputation within the community.
jobs.current_solution: Joining and attending events organized by Santa Barbara newcomers.
jobs.pain_points: Difficulty in finding relevant events makes it challenging to engage meaningfully.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Establish a reputation as an active and sociable newcomer.
jobs.success_criteria: Gain recognition among peers as an active participant in community events.

jobs.job_statement: When I participate in community events, I want to be perceived as an active member and contributor, so I can build my social reputation.
jobs.current_solution: Attending events and engaging with members.
jobs.pain_points: Difficulty in contacting organizers could hinder participation and visibility.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Easily communicate with event organizers to confirm attendance or express interest.
jobs.success_criteria: Users feel recognized and valued within the community due to active participation.

jobs.job_statement: When I attend events, I want to be perceived as an engaged and active member of the community, so I can build my social network.
jobs.current_solution: Participation in events is encouraged.
jobs.pain_points: Difficulties in joining events may lead to feelings of exclusion.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Increased visibility and acceptance within the community as a proactive member.
jobs.success_criteria: Members report feeling more connected and recognized within the community after attending events.

jobs.job_statement: When I need to update my profile information, I want to do it quickly and easily, so I can keep my details current.
jobs.current_solution: Accessing the member profile page on the website.
jobs.pain_points: Finding how to update profile information is not straightforward.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Quick and intuitive access to profile management.
jobs.success_criteria: Users can update their profile information without confusion or delay.

jobs.job_statement: When I need to cancel an event registration, I want a straightforward process, so I can manage my commitments efficiently.
jobs.current_solution: Contacting the committee via email to cancel.
jobs.pain_points: There is no direct option to cancel registrations on the app or website, requiring multiple steps.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A clear, direct method to cancel event registrations.
jobs.success_criteria: Users can cancel registrations with one or two clicks.

jobs.job_statement: When I want to gather information about the newcomers' activities, I want it to be easily accessible, so I can make informed decisions about my participation.
jobs.current_solution: Using the app and occasionally checking the website.
jobs.pain_points: Information is scattered and hard to find; the website lacks a clear structure.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Centralized and organized information about events and committees.
jobs.success_criteria: Quickly find and understand information regarding activities and how to participate.

jobs.job_statement: When I am planning for events, I want to have effective training resources, so I can maximize my contribution as a committee member.
jobs.current_solution: Current training sessions that are often inadequate.
jobs.pain_points: Training sessions do not equip new members with necessary skills and knowledge.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Comprehensive training that prepares members for their roles effectively.
jobs.success_criteria: New members feel confident and capable in their roles after training.

jobs.job_statement: When I need to organize events, I want access to a dedicated technical support person, so I can focus on creative aspects instead of technical difficulties.
jobs.current_solution: Reliance on volunteers and committee members for technical support.
jobs.pain_points: Lack of availability of knowledgeable support leads to inefficiencies during event planning.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Access to a technical expert who can assist with website and event management issues.
jobs.success_criteria: Event planning processes run smoothly with technical support readily available.

jobs.job_statement: When I have questions or need assistance, I want to quickly find help, so I can resolve issues without frustration.
jobs.current_solution: Access to committee chairs' emails for direct communication.
jobs.pain_points: Finding the right contact information on the app is not straightforward.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Clear access to support and resources when needed.
jobs.success_criteria: Users can find help quickly and effectively address any issues they encounter.

jobs.job_statement: When I am training new committee members, I want to provide them with adequate resources, so they can quickly learn how to use the website effectively.
jobs.current_solution: Conducting informal training sessions.
jobs.pain_points: Current training methods are inadequate and lead to confusion among new users.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A structured training program that equips new members with the knowledge they need to use the website.
jobs.success_criteria: New committee members feel confident and competent in using the website after training.

jobs.job_statement: When managing events, I want to have a system that archives past events and decisions, so I can ensure continuity and avoid repeating past mistakes.
jobs.current_solution: Relying on informal notes and memory.
jobs.pain_points: Lack of institutional memory leads to repeated issues and inefficiencies.
jobs.desired_outcomes: A formalized archival process that documents past events and decisions.
jobs.success_criteria: Committee members can easily access historical data to inform their planning and decision-making.

jobs.job_statement: When I receive notifications about new events or updates, I want them to be clear and actionable, so I can easily engage with the community.
jobs.current_solution: Notifications are sent through the app.
jobs.pain_points: Many members do not receive or notice notifications, leading to missed opportunities.
jobs.desired_outcomes: Effective communication that ensures all members are informed and can participate in community events.
jobs.success_criteria: High levels of engagement in events following improved notification systems.
